messages.subject: Single Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to say, Thank you! to all the ladies out there who responded to my query about being single and unschooling. I heard from an incredibly large
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to say, 'Thank you!" to all the ladies out there who responded
to my query about being single and unschooling.

I heard from an incredibly large number of you. I am so impressed with how
much you shared and opened up.

I can't believe the great strength and wisdom so many of you shared on how
you handled your experiences. I am really humbled by it all.

I wish you all the happiness in the world.

Much love,
Wildflower
